TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry

summary.span: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.

span.span: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會維護所指的是該簽發者的名稱對應的每個受信任的簽發者憑證的受信任簽發者的字典。The class maintains a dictionary of trusted issuers by mapping the certificate of each trusted issuer to a name that refers to that issuer. 憑證會指定使用 ASN.1 編碼的憑證指紋的格式。The certificates are specified using the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint. 簽發者名稱可以是任何字串，只要它是唯一的應用程式範圍內。The issuer name can be any string, as long as it is unique within the scope of the application. 可以透過存取此字典屬性。This dictionary can be accessed through the property. 此類別只可以解決 X.509 憑證。The class can only resolve X.509 certificates. 將底下的項目新增組態檔中指定的受信任簽發者對應[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)項目。The map of trusted issuers is specified in a configuration file by adding entries under the [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element. ``元素是子元素[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目，而且這是有效的時機中指定類別`type`該項目的屬性。The `` element is a child element of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element and it is valid when the class is specified in the `type` attribute of that element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱各項目中的文件[WIF 組態結構描述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9)。For more information, see the documentation for each of these elements in the [WIF Configuration Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9). 如需簽發者名稱登錄的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about issuer name registries, see the class. 您可以從衍生來實作您自己的組態架構的簽發者名稱登錄。You can derive from to implement your own configuration based issuer name registry. 您覆寫的方法視您的實作。Which methods you override will depend upon your implementation. 例如，您可以覆寫從自訂組態結構描述載入組態的方法。For example, you can override the method to load configuration from a custom configuration schema. ## Examples 下列 XML 顯示設定加入集合的安全性權杖處理常式。The following XML shows configuration for a added for a collection of security token handlers. ``行為類似傳統的.NET 組態集合的項目允許``，``和``子項目的項目。The `` element behaves like a classic .NET configuration collection, allowing the ``, `` and `` elements as child elements. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddTrustedIssuer (string certificateThumbprint, string name);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddTrustedIssuer(string certificateThumbprint, string name) cil managed
Public Sub AddTrustedIssuer (certificateThumbprint As String, name As String)
public: void AddTrustedIssuer(System::String ^ certificateThumbprint, System::String ^ name);

param.name: certificateThumbprint
param.span: ASN.1 encoded form of the issuer's certificate thumbprint.

span.span: ASN.1 encoded form of the issuer's certificate thumbprint.
The name of the issuer.

summary.span: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.

span.span: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以呼叫這個方法可加入至簽發者字典。You can call this method to add issuers to the dictionary. 在衍生類別中，您可以呼叫這個方法從方法，將簽發者加入至字典。In derived classes, you can call this method from the method to add issuers to the dictionary.

span.span: is or empty.
-or- is or empty.

exception.span: The issuer specified by has already been configured.

span.span: The issuer specified by has already been configured.

exception.span: (The issuer already exists in the dictionary.)

span.span: (The issuer already exists in the dictionary.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfiguredTrustedIssuers As IDictionary(Of String, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ ConfiguredTrustedIssuers { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.

span.span: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.

value.span: 字典，其中包含受信任的簽發者。

span.span: A dictionary that contains the trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典的索引鍵是指紋的 ASN.1 編碼格式的受信任簽發者憑證，而值是指紋的簽發者名稱。The key to the dictionary is the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint of the trusted issuer's certificate and the value is the issuer name. 字典中包含組態中所指定的簽發者並新增任何其他簽發者方法。The dictionary contains the issuers that were specified in configuration and any additional issuers that have been added with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetIssuerName(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken) cil managed

param.name: securityToken
param.span: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.

span.span: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.
Should be assignable as .

summary.span: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.

span.span: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.

returns.span: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the dictionary; otherwise, .

span.span: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the dictionary; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作搜尋字典中指定的 X.509 憑證的指紋`securityToken`。The default implementation searches the dictionary for the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate specified in `securityToken`. 如果找到項目，則會傳回簽發者名稱。否則，`null`傳回。If an entry is found, the issuer name is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 如果`securityToken`無法從，`null`傳回。If `securityToken` is not assignable from , `null` is returned.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList customConfiguration) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (customConfiguration As XmlNodeList)

param.name: customConfiguration
param.span: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.

span.span: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.

summary.span: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.

span.span: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定基礎結構會呼叫方法。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 呼叫這個方法時，`nodelist`會包含最上層子項目的[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)從組態檔項目。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element from the configuration file. 每一種可能，接著，會包含屬性或子項目，視您為您衍生的類別定義組態結構描述。Each of these may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 設定基礎結構會呼叫這個方法。This method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 預設實作會載入組態從[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)項目 (設定之下[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目)。The default implementation loads configuration from a [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element (configured under the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element). 您可以覆寫此方法以提供您自己的自訂組態項目，衍生類別中的支援。You can override this method to provide support for your own custom configuration elements in derived classes.

span.span: is .

exception.span: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.

span.span: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.
